//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name           Reg   Size
//   -------------- ----- ----
//   matMVP         c8       4
//   matInvEye      c16      3
//   contextCP      c24      1
//   cameraPosition c31      1
//   fadeParams     c38      1
//   vSubDivAspect  c39      1
//   vStepTexel     c40      1
//   vConfig        c41      1
//   vCornerUV      c42      1
//

    vs_3_0
    def c0, 0, 255, 0.00100000005, 1
    def c1, 0.159154937, 0.5, 6.28318548, -3.14159274
    def c2, 0.5, -0.5, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_normal v1
    dcl_color v2
    dcl_texcoord v3
    dcl_texcoord1 v4
    dcl_texcoord2 v5
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_texcoord o1.xyz
    dcl_color o2
    dcl_texcoord2 o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s0

    mad r0.x, v4.x, c0.y, c0.z
    rcp r0.y, c39.x
    mul r0.z, r0.y, r0.x
    frc r0.w, r0.z
    add r1.x, r0.z, -r0.w
    slt r0.w, -r0.w, r0.w
    slt r0.z, r0.z, -r0.z
    mad r1.yw, r0.z, r0.w, r1.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, r0.y, -r1.w
    mul r1.xz, r0.x, c39.x
    mad r0, r1, c40.xyxy, c40
    add r0.xy, r0, -c40.zwzw
    lrp r1.xy, v0, r0, r0.zwzw
    mul r0.x, c39.w, v0.x
    mov r0.y, v0.y
    add r0.zw, -r0.xyxy, r1.xyxy
    mov r1.xw, c0
    slt r1.xyz, r1.x, c41
    mad o1.xy, r1.x, r0.zwzw, r0
    add r0.xyz, -c31, v5
    dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp o1.z, r0.x
    mad r0.x, v3.x, c1.x, c1.y
    frc r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c1.z, c1.w
    sincos r2.xy, r0.x
    mul r0.xyz, c17, v5.w
    mul r3.xyz, r2.y, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r2.x, r0
    mul r4.xyz, c16, v5.w
    mad r2.xzw, r4.xyyz, r2.x, -r3.xyyz
    mad r0.xyz, r4, r2.y, r0
    lrp r3.xy, v0, c42.zwzw, c42
    mul r0.xyz, r0, r3.y
    mad r0.xyz, r2.xzww, r3.x, r0
    add r0.xyz, r0, v5
    lrp r2.xyz, r1.y, v1.yzxw, c18.yzxw
    mul r4.xyz, r2, v3.zxyw
    mad r2.xyz, v3.yzxw, r2.yzxw, -r4
    nrm r4.xyz, r2
    mul r2.xyz, r4, v5.w
    mul r3.xzw, r3.x, v3.xyyz
    mad r2.xyz, r2, r3.y, r3.xzww
    add r2.xyz, r2, v5
    lrp r3.xyz, r1.z, r2, r0
    add r0.xyz, -r3, c31
    mad r0.xyz, c41.w, r0, r3
    mul r2, r0.y, c9
    mad r2, c8, r0.x, r2
    mad r0, c10, r0.z, r2
    add r0, r0, c11

mov o0, r0 // Relocated from line 109 with shadertool.py

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --auto-fix-vertex-halo --git VertexShader_343_CRC32_B861C52D.txt
texldl r5, c220.z, s0
add r5.w, r0.w, -r5.y
mad r0.x, r5.w, r5.x, r0.x

    rcp r1.x, r0.w
    mul r1.xy, r0, r1.x
    mad o3.xy, r1, c2, c2.x
    add r1.x, r0.z, c24.x
    rcp r1.y, c24.y
    mul o3.z, r1.y, r1.x
    rcp r1.x, v5.w
    mul o3.w, r1.x, c24.y
    add r1.x, r0.z, -c38.x

//     mov o0, r0 // Relocated to line 100 with shadertool.py
    mad_sat r0.x, r1.x, -c38.z, r1.w
    mul o2.w, r0.x, v2.w
    mov o2.xyz, v2

// approximately 74 instruction slots used
